page.title: 03Interview with PC Pinnington
page.content:
1
P.C.Pinnington has been a policeman for 15 years. He wanted to join the force so he could help other people.He used to be a constable then was given promotion to be a sergeant. He went on picket duty during the miners' strike. He enjoys his work a lot.He has made many arrests and was once run over by a man who had just stolen a car. He works shift work and each shift is eight hours long.He wears a blue uniform and a heavy blue helmet and carries a truncheon and a purse for his handcuffs. He tried out his handcuffs on Kirstin. He does not carry a gun.Sometimes he drives a police car.His wife was a police woman for 6 years. We know him because he was Jane's neighbour. by Jane Baker & Kirstin Chesney.
